00043         /* IAR doesn't accept dots in macro names */
00044         .macro  ld_addr, reg, sym
00045         lda.w   \reg, \sym
00046         .endm
00047 
00048         /* Define a function \a name that is either globally visible or only
00049          * file-local.
00050          */
00051         .macro gas_begin_func name, is_public
00052                 .if \is_public
00053                 .global \name
00054                 .endif
00055                 .section .text.\name, "ax", @progbits
00056                 .type \name, @function
00057         \name :
00058         .endm
00059 
00060         /* Define \a name as a weak alias for the function \a strong_name */
00061         .macro gas_weak_function_alias name, strong_name
00062         .global \name
00063         .weak   \name
00064         .type   \name, @function
00065         .set    \name, \strong_name
00066         .endm
00067 
00068         /* Define a weak function called \a name */
00069         .macro gas_weak_function name
00070         .weak   \name
00071         gas_begin_func \name 1
00072         .endm
00073

00075 #define END_REPEAT()            .endr
